ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
des: "Delicious gravy with TVP.  Serve over hot noodles, potatoes or rice."
ins: In a 3 quart saucepan over medium heat, combine textured vegetable protein, soup, sliced mushrooms (with liquid), onion, soy sauce, seasoning salt, savory and water.  Simmer until onions are tender and gravy reaches desired consistency.
